entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
